search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Appcues (appcues.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Appcues is [https://www.appcues.com/pricing](https://www.appcues.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

**Pricing scales with Monthly Active Users (MAU)**

MAUs are calculated as the total number of unique users who sign into your platform in any given month.

MTUs are calculated as the total number of users who sign into your platform in any given month.

![Image 61](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6762119e1fbfb186d2174b25/6762119e1fbfb186d2175264_system-regular-19-book.gif)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Have another question? Looking for more detail? Check out Appcues Docs!

[Appcues docs](https://docs.appcues.com/)

Do you have a free trial?

Yes! Our free trial is designed to let you experience the complete value of Appcues and confirm technical fit with your product. Show unlimited flows to your end users and track up to 5 events for 14 days. If you install the SDK in your application, you can extend your trial for another 14 days for a total trial period of 28 days.

How are Monthly Tracked Users (MTU) calculated?

MTUs are calculated as the total number of users who sign in to your platform in a given month plus additional, unique users who receive an Appcues email or mobile push message within that same month. We don't charge you for dormant users who may be in your database but don't log any Appcues activity during the month.

Can I try Appcues before committing to a plan?

Absolutely—no credit card required.

What happens if I go over my plan limits (exceed the MTUs or Messages allowed)?

If you exceed any limits on your plan, we'll keep all of your Appcues experiences running and somebody from our team will reach out about upgrading your account at your next billing cycle.

Appcues offers the most flexible way to create personalized multi-channel experiences—from onboarding to adoption and retention. Get started free.
